item.title: 欧盟将从制裁名单中删除 4 名俄罗斯国民

item.title: 超级地产的 "秘密 "代理人
item.description: 在最昂贵住宅的稀有世界里，谨慎是一切，销售可能会吸引投机者，但有一群不为人知的经纪人却在悄无声息地运作着【原文：In the rarefied world of the most expensive homes, where discretion is everything and sales can be a magnet to opportunists, a clutch of under-the-radar agents is oh-so-quietly operating】

item.title: 一级方程式商业
item.description: 本赛季，F2新一轮人才辈出；汉密尔顿面临最严峻的考验；公牛车队瞄准Z世代车迷；威廉姆斯车队希望通过交易重新崛起；穆勒成为F1首位女性赛车工程师；没有本土英雄的上海站能否蓬勃发展？【原文：A new wave of talent from F2 steps up to the grid this season; Hamilton faces toughest test; Racing Bulls targets Gen Z fans; Williams hopes deals spark resurgence; Mueller becomes F1’s first female race engineer; and can Shanghai’s GP thrive devoid of its local hero?】

item.title: 对冲基金大亨的兴衰史

item.title: F1 的 "青年震荡"：一帮新手如何接管 2025 年的赛道
item.description: 本周末在墨尔本，将有五名年轻车手代表各自车队出战。最年轻的车手基米-安东内利（Kimi Antonelli）年仅 18 岁，他的任务是接替刘易斯-汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）。【原文：Not one but five young drivers start for their teams in Melbourne this weekend. And at just 18, the youngest, Kimi Antonelli, has the unenviable task of replacing Lewis Hamilton】

item.title: 人类的脑力是否已达到顶峰？
item.description: 各国和各年龄段的数据显示，人们越来越难以集中注意力，语言和数字推理能力也在下降【原文：Data across countries and ages reveal a growing struggle to concentrate, and declining verbal and numerical reasoning】

item.title: DeepSeek focuses on research over revenue in contrast to Silicon Valley
item.description: Chinese start-up to concentrate resources on building machines with humanlike cognitive capabilities
